module.description: Creates a new, generic NgModule definition in the given or default project.

component.description: Creates a new, generic component definition in the given or default project.

directive.description: Creates a new, generic directive definition in the given or default project.

pipe.description: Creates a new, generic pipe definition in the given or default project.

service.description: Creates a new, generic service definition in the given or default project.

class.description: Creates a new, generic class definition in the given or default project.

interface.description: Creates a new, generic class definition in the given or default project.
